title: MONEY SAVER! 1X1 FURNISHED ALL BILLS PAID CONDO MIDIRISE $2300 MONTHLY
posting_body: ['MONEY SAVER!', ' Fully Furnished ALL BILLS PAID INCLUDED Hirise Condo located 1 block from famous Galleria Shopping Mall.', 'Great atmosphere to reside in the Uptown Houston Area , well centralized location with access to all major highways.', 'Beautiful floor-plan with lots of natural sunlight Rent includes nice furniture, lights, high speed internet, TV- Cable, Water, washer and dryer included.', 'Rent is $2400 per month plus deposit.', 'Can lease for 6, or 12 months rent.', 'Call today', 'show contact info', 'ROGER Hirise close to everything!', 'Pet Friendly Community, Pets Welcomed!', 'Nice Doggie park just built -', 'show contact info']
